name: Weave6
description: Weave6 is an Omnichain asset trading infrastructure that incorporates an indexer, marketplace, and launchpad to form a one-stop access for dApps to launch, and for users to mint and trade Omnichain assets. By leveraging the cross-chain and Omnichain standard infrastructure, users on Weave6 can manage their multi-chain assets with a chain-agnostic, seamless experience. dApps on Weave6 can launch their Omnichain assets with integrated and native cross-chain interoperability.
